mapper.sql: WAREHOUSE_ID, MEMBER_CODE, WAREHOUSE_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE, WAREHOUSE_CTYPE, AREA_CODE, WAREHOUSE_PHONE, WAREHOUSE_ADDR, WAREHOUSE_MOBILE, WAREHOUSE_REMARK, WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE, WAREHOUSE_STATE, BASIC_SHARE, WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN, WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE
mapper.select:
select
from BASIC_WAREHOUSE where MEMBER_CODE= #{memberCode}
and WAREHOUSE_CODE like '%'||#{warehouseCode}||'%'
and WAREHOUSE_NAME like '%'||#{warehouseName}||'%'
and AREA_CODE like '%'||#{areaCode}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into BASIC_WAREHOUSE (WAREHOUSE_ID, MEMBER_CODE, WAREHOUSE_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE, WAREHOUSE_CTYPE, AREA_CODE, WAREHOUSE_PHONE, WAREHOUSE_ADDR, WAREHOUSE_MOBILE, WAREHOUSE_REMARK, WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE, WAREHOUSE_STATE, BASIC_SHARE, WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN, WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE) values (#{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseMnemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseWareplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouseState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{basicShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseOwnSupervise,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into BASIC_WAREHOUSE
WAREHOUSE_ID,
MEMBER_CODE,
WAREHOUSE_CODE,
WAREHOUSE_NAME,
WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE,
WAREHOUSE_CTYPE,
AREA_CODE,
WAREHOUSE_PHONE,
WAREHOUSE_ADDR,
WAREHOUSE_MOBILE,
WAREHOUSE_REMARK,
WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE,
WAREHOUSE_STATE,
BASIC_SHARE,
WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN,
WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE,
BASIC_WAREHOUSE_SEQ.nextval,
#{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
(select lpad((max(bb.warehouse_code)+1),4,'0')as code from basic_warehouse bb),
#{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseMnemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseCtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseWareplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{warehouseState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{basicShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{warehouseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warehouseOwnSupervise,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update BASIC_WAREHOUSE
MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_NAME = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE = #{warehouseMnemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_CTYPE = #{warehouseCtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_PHONE = #{warehousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_ADDR = #{warehouseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_MOBILE = #{warehouseMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_REMARK = #{warehouseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE = #{warehouseWareplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAREHOUSE_STATE = #{warehouseState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASIC_SHARE = #{basicShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN = #{warehouseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE = #{warehouseOwnSupervise,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update BASIC_WAREHOUSE
MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_NAME = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE = #{warehouseMnemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_CTYPE = #{warehouseCtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_PHONE = #{warehousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_ADDR = #{warehouseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_MOBILE = #{warehouseMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_REMARK = #{warehouseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE = #{warehouseWareplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAREHOUSE_STATE = #{warehouseState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASIC_SHARE = #{basicShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN = #{warehouseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE = #{warehouseOwnSupervise,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BASIC_WAREHOUSE set MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_NAME = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_MNEMCODE = #{warehouseMnemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_CTYPE = #{warehouseCtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_PHONE = #{warehousePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_ADDR = #{warehouseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_MOBILE = #{warehouseMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_REMARK = #{warehouseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_WAREPLACE = #{warehouseWareplace,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAREHOUSE_STATE = #{warehouseState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BASIC_SHARE = #{basicShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAREHOUSE_LINKMAN = #{warehouseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_OWN_SUPERVISE = #{warehouseOwnSupervise,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
